title: The Curse of Tulsi: A Mythological Tale

chapters.title: Introduction to Tulsi
chapters.description: Learn about Tulsi, the sacred plant, and its divine association in Hindu mythology.

chapters.title: Tulsi and Jalandhara
chapters.description: Discover the story of Tulsi's marriage to the demon king Jalandhara and her steadfast devotion.

chapters.title: The Deception of Lord Vishnu
chapters.description: Understand how Lord Vishnu, to aid the gods, disguises himself to weaken Jalandhara.

chapters.title: Tulsi's Curse on Vishnu
chapters.description: Witness Tulsi's anguish and her heartfelt curse upon realizing Vishnu's role in deceiving her.

chapters.title: Transformation and Blessing
chapters.description: Explore how Tulsi transforms into a holy plant and becomes inseparably linked to Lord Vishnu.
